Posts.Content: Hiya all very new to this site.  Had breast surgery yesterday and have cam home with stockings on.  Just realise no one told me how long or when to use these.   Thanks
Posts.Title: Sugical stockings

Posts.Content: Thanks for all the replies went to local nurse today and she said 4-5 weeks but I too only have one pair.  Will speak to my nurse at the hospital on Wednesday and double check.:-)
Posts.Title: Sugical stockings
